thread.section_title: BoxyMo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BoxyMo | www.boxymo.ie
thread.title: Deirdre Mc Laugh Lin
thread.title_full: BoxyMo reviewed by Deirdre Mc Laugh Lin

author: Deirdre Mc Laugh Lin
title: Deirdre Mc Laugh Lin
text:
I can honestly say i've been a happy customer the past year
I love the texts letting you know how you are driving
Personally think more drivers should avail of this safe tracking progress option.
The ony problem i had was when i went on holiday i got messages saying 'telematics device error' because i wasnt moving the car. But i chatted online and it was resolved straight away :)
I've never waited any longer than 5 minutes for an online chat
and prefer it to over the phone
Every other company would'nt insure me or tried to charge me 4k
Will stay with Boxymo :)
